member.name: T:Unity.Publishing.Api.IntegrationTest.ApiBuildsIntegrationTest
member.summary: Test /api/builds and related endpoint

member.name: M:Unity.Publishing.Api.IntegrationTest.ApiBuildsIntegrationTest.CheckMethodsTest
member.summary: 1. Check if the methods of this api have been changed.

member.name: M:Unity.Publishing.Api.IntegrationTest.ApiBuildsIntegrationTest.GetAccessAPITest
member.summary:
1. use GET method to access the API 2. check the data model in response content is correct.
/api/builds
/api/builds/ci

member.name: M:Unity.Publishing.Api.IntegrationTest.ApiBuildsIntegrationTest.GetAccessAPIWithIdTest
M:Unity.Publishing.Api.IntegrationTest.ApiBuildsIntegrationTest.BuildsWithKatanaTest
member.summary:
All kanata build in the give branch should be fetched without missing. Only compare the number of builds.
/api/builds
member.remarks: The testcase compares where we read from /api/builds against the Katana JSON api There is a risk if the Katana JSON API is wrong, so the error is overlooked.

member.name: M:Unity.Publishing.Api.IntegrationTest.ApiBuildsIntegrationTest.PromoteBuildTest
member.summary:
promote a build.
/api/builds/{id}/promote

member.name: M:Unity.Publishing.Api.IntegrationTest.ApiBuildsIntegrationTest.GetBuildsIdFromReleaseTrack(System.String)
member.summary: return the builds Id of a branch
member.returns: the builds id under that branch

member.summary: Test suite for general test for all endpoint.

member.name: M:Unity.Publishing.Api.IntegrationTest.RestAPITest.StatusCodeOfGetTest
member.summary: This test is try to get the status code of API without {*id*} option. All the API paths are read from the API document.

member.name: M:Unity.Publishing.Api.IntegrationTest.RestAPITest.StatusCodeOfGetWithIdTest
member.summary: This test is try to get the status code of API with a {*id*} option.
member.remarks: However, the implemente of test is not perfect yet because the {*id*} has different meaning under different context. We only interest in 500 error for now. In any case, there shouldn't a 500 error return.

member.name: M:Unity.Publishing.Api.IntegrationTest.RestAPITest.InvalidApiKeyTest
member.summary: Use an invalid key to access API should return 401 error. Only works for API without {*id*}

member.summary: Check if there are any endpoint added/removed Current Available endpoints are hard coded in the testcase.

member.summary: Check the whether or not an API is running
